title: 四面佛三十籤第七籤
poem: 蒼松翠柏志氣堅,雨雪風霜益增強,爆竹一聲春色空,大地萬物樂融融。

analysis.zh: 身強體健、精神矜持，外邪無法侵擾，彷彿蒼松翠柏般挺拔堅韌。財運亨通，運勢連綿，財源不斷，春日暖陽象徵新氣象，四季財源滾滾。感情穩定、情投意合，堅定不移，無懼外來干擾；春天到來，喜事紛呈，男女結合百年好合。事業志向高遠，越是困難越能激發鬥志，機會一到，成就無限。
analysis.en: You possess a strong body and a steadfast spirit, impervious to external harm—like the unwavering green pine and cypress. Financial luck flows steadily, and fortune keeps arriving; the spring sun heralds a new, vibrant outlook, and wealth accumulates throughout the seasons. Your relationships are stable and aligned, unshaken by outside forces; when spring comes, joyous events unfold, and a marriage between man and woman promises lifelong harmony. Career ambitions are lofty; every challenge strengthens your resolve, and when opportunity strikes, your success will be boundless.
analysis.jp: あなたは体力があり、精神も堅く、外部の邪悪や病気が侵入できません。まるで青い松や真柏のようにしっかりと立ち、しっかりしています。金運が良く、運勢も連続して続き、春の暖陽が新たな気象を象徴し、四季を通じて財源が滲滲と流れます。恋愛は安定しており、心が合致し、愛は揺るぎません。外部の影響を恐れず、春になると幸せな出来事が訪れます。男女の結婚は長い幸福を約束します。事業面では高い理想を持ち、困難があるほど闘志が強まります。機会が来れば、成功は無限です。

rag_analysis:
According to the poem, the core meaning is:
- The poem likens the seeker to steadfast trees, symbolising resilience against hardship.
- It foresees prosperous financial flow and stable relationships, suggesting that strength will attract abundance and harmony.
- The verses emphasize that adversity can strengthen one’s will, hinting at a philosophy of growth through challenge.
